sentences.en: Bap measurement were extremely scanty in this report.
sentences.cn: 在这个报告中,Bap的测定结果是十分缺乏的.

sentences.en: Crops are very scanty this year.
Details of his life are scanty.
sentences.cn: 关于他的生平，详细资料不多。

sentences.en: He was cut off from all but a scanty radio communication with his armies.
sentences.cn: 他同他的部队之间除了零星无线电联络以外,一切的联系都被切断了.

sentences.en: He was kindly, within his scanty means generous, and obliging.
sentences.cn: 他和蔼可亲, 在自己菲薄的经济能力范围内乐善好施, 有求必应.

sentences.en: His grandfather made a scanty living by practising feng shui for people.
sentences.cn: 他的祖父靠给人看风水勉强维持生计.

sentences.en: His head was large and ugly; he had pale scanty hair and an earthy skin.
sentences.cn: 他的脑袋大而丑, 头发灰白稀疏,土色的皮肤.

sentences.en: Much of the scanty information available comes from Chinese records.
sentences.cn: 可获得的极少数资料大多来自中国的记载.

sentences.en: Scanty but growing evidence links the character of early diagenesis with specific depositional environments.
sentences.cn: 有关早期成岩作用的特征与特定沉积环境的关系,证据虽然不多,但却在不断增加.

sentences.en: So far, what scanty evidence we have points to two suspects.
sentences.cn: 迄今为止，我们掌握的能够指证两个嫌疑犯的证据少得可怜。

sentences.en: The news today is so far scanty, but good.
sentences.cn: 今天的消息不多, 但很好.

sentences.en: The rainfall was rather scanty this month.
The weather grew drier and the grass became scanty and the nomads stirred afresh.
sentences.cn: 气候干燥,水草稀少,游牧民重新动荡起来.

sentences.en: There is only scanty evidence of his involvement.
sentences.cn: 显示他牵涉其中的证据不足。

sentences.en: There is scanty evidence to support their accusations.
We have to consider all contingencies in the employment of our scanty and overpressed air force.
sentences.cn: 我们在使用我们既属有限而又负担过重的空军时,必须考虑到一切意外事件.

words.tran_cn: 不足的；缺乏的；勉强够的
缺乏地；吝啬地；不充足地

trans.tran_cn: （大小或数量）不足的，勉强够的
trans.tran_en: You describe something as scanty when there is less of it than you think there should be
